assumptions.assumption: Claude Code CLI is pre-authenticated and ready for headless execution
assumptions.rationale: Workers and Managers spawn as separate Claude Code processes without interactive login
assumptions.impact_if_false: Pipeline cannot start; requires manual authentication setup

assumptions.rationale: orchestrate.sh and process management rely on bash syntax and commands
assumptions.impact_if_false: Windows users require WSL or alternative orchestration

assumptions.assumption: Node.js 18+ LTS and npm are installed on the development machine
assumptions.rationale: Watcher service requires modern Node.js features and npm for dependencies
assumptions.impact_if_false: Dashboard and WebSocket bridge will not function

assumptions.assumption: Git repository is initialized with proper .gitignore
assumptions.rationale: Crisis Mode relies on git reset; file tracking essential for ADR
assumptions.impact_if_false: Crisis revert may fail; sensitive files may be committed

assumptions.assumption: Context window size is approximately 200,000 tokens
assumptions.rationale: 60% threshold calculations based on 200K context window
assumptions.impact_if_false: Rotation thresholds need recalibration for different models
assumptions.validation_method: Check Claude model documentation for context limits

assumptions.assumption: Internet connectivity available for AI API calls
assumptions.rationale: Claude Code requires API access for AI reasoning
assumptions.impact_if_false: Pipeline halts; no offline mode available
assumptions.validation_method: Ping anthropic.com or run test API call

assumptions.assumption: KreativReason documentation guides are available in /docs folder
assumptions.rationale: Distiller references guides for task breakdown; Workers need pattern guidance
assumptions.impact_if_false: Task breakdown may be suboptimal; Workers lack context
assumptions.validation_method: Verify existence of /docs directory with guide files

assumptions.assumption: Workers must be stateless - no memory retention between tasks
assumptions.rationale: Core architectural principle; prevents context rot and cognitive debt
assumptions.impact_if_false: System loses primary value proposition; context rot occurs
assumptions.validation_method: Verify Worker processes fully terminate between tasks

assumptions.assumption: Manager must rotate at 60% context threshold
assumptions.rationale: Prevents entry into Dumb Zone where reasoning quality degrades
assumptions.impact_if_false: Hallucination and errors increase beyond 60% context fill
assumptions.validation_method: Monitor telemetry and verify rotation triggers

assumptions.assumption: All code must pass LLVM/compiler and unit tests before commit
assumptions.rationale: Back pressure ensures code quality; guardrails prevent regressions
assumptions.impact_if_false: Bad code enters codebase; technical debt accumulates
assumptions.validation_method: Pre-commit hooks verify compiler and test pass

assumptions.assumption: Tasks must be atomic enough to complete in <40% context window
assumptions.rationale: Workers need room for Ralph Loop iterations within Smart Zone
assumptions.impact_if_false: Workers enter Dumb Zone mid-task; quality degrades
assumptions.validation_method: Monitor Worker context fill during task execution

assumptions.assumption: No export default - only named exports per KreativReason standards
assumptions.rationale: Consistency and explicit imports for maintainability
assumptions.impact_if_false: Code style inconsistency; potential import issues

assumptions.assumption: Every Prisma query must include tenantId for multi-tenancy
assumptions.rationale: Data isolation required for multi-tenant SaaS applications
assumptions.impact_if_false: Data leaks between tenants; security vulnerability
assumptions.validation_method: RipGrep audit for Prisma queries without tenantId

assumptions.assumption: System operates autonomously but requires human for Crisis intervention
assumptions.rationale: Human oversight needed for emergency situations and course correction
assumptions.impact_if_false: Runaway processes; uncontrolled token burn; bad commits
assumptions.validation_method: Dashboard accessible and Crisis button functional

assumptions.assumption: Worker task completion within 15-30 minute window
assumptions.rationale: Tasks designed as atomic units; longer tasks indicate poor decomposition
assumptions.validation_method: Monitor task completion times in telemetry

assumptions.assumption: Telemetry latency under 100ms from file change to UI update
assumptions.rationale: Real-time feedback essential for human monitoring
assumptions.impact_if_false: Dashboard appears laggy; human reaction time impacted
assumptions.validation_method: Measure timestamp delta between write and render

assumptions.assumption: Crisis response time under 2 seconds from button click
assumptions.rationale: Emergency stop must be immediate to prevent further damage
assumptions.impact_if_false: Additional bad commits or token burn during delay
assumptions.validation_method: Time from click event to process termination

assumptions.assumption: Cost target of $10.42/hour for autonomous operation
assumptions.rationale: ROI calculation based on this operational cost
assumptions.validation_method: Compare actual API costs with projected rate
